quiz.question: What is the capital city of Saint Lucia, overlooking a natural harbor?
Which country announced plans to relocate its capital from Malabo to the inland Ciudad de la Paz (Oyala)?
Which capital's historic district was inscribed as a UNESCO site in 2002 for its wooden colonial architecture?
What is the capital city of the Pacific island nation Palau, known for its Rock Islands?
Which capital was created and inaugurated in 1970 following the devastation of the former capital by a hurricane?
Which capital sits on an atoll lagoon and has a strip-like form with settlements along a narrow reef rim?
What is the capital city of the Federated States of Micronesia, located on Pohnpei island?
Which capital's name translates to 'big town' or 'big village' in a local West African language?
Which capital is the administrative center of a nation where the government functions across multiple islands and a continental mainland?
What is the national capital of the Marshall Islands situated on Majuro atoll?
Which national capital's airport sits on a different island than the main administrative center, requiring boat transfers?
Which capital's international airport is built on a reclaimed island separated from the government district by narrow channels?
Which city is the capital of Equatorial Guinea, located on Bioko Island?
Which capital city was re-established after colonial rule and now hosts both modern ministries and historic districts?
Which capital city served as a temporary national capital during independence transition before the seat returned to an older city?
